info.title: Create a meteo widget connected to a free meteo API
info.description: The main purpose of this job is managing asynchronous requests to an external API, using promises or async/await requests with the Fetch API. As a second goal, the use of FontAwesome icons makes iconography simplier to manage.

info.title: Showcase site for commercial purpose
info.description: Reactive structure for a web site dedicated to business & tech activities. The class-based concepts defined by Bootstrap are used here to experiment main components such as navbar, carousel, cards or forms.

info.title: Online shared librairy
info.description: The concept of shared webApp introduces credentials management in order to enable any user to consult books, but only owners to modify them. Image file management (blob) on server is also set. This webApp is hosted on Firebase which enables easy identification process and persistent data.

info.title: Todo List widget
info.description: Persistent webApp displaying tasks to do. Filtering functions enabled. Tasks can be modified or created by user. Deleting is possible task by task, or by type 'completed'.
